entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
